history.proof: intros l H. destruct l. - contradiction. - exists b. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type f : A -> nat b : btree A l : list (btree A) H : b :: l <> nil Unable to unify "build (?M1555 :: nil) ?M1555" with "build (b :: l) b".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
f: A -> nat

Goal:
forall l : list (btree A), l <> nil -> {t : btree A | build l t}

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
Inductive build : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop := build_one : forall t : btree A, build (t :: nil) t | build_step : forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> build l1 t Arguments build _%list_scope Arguments build_step _ (_ _)%list_scope
obuildf : forall l : list (btree A), l <> nil -> ordered (sum_order f) l -> {t : btree A | build l t}
exists_last : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), l <> nil -> {l' : list A & {a : A | l = l' ++ a :: nil}}
cover_min_ex : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list (btree A)), l <> nil -> exists t : btree A, cover_min A f l t
cover_not_nil : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), cover l t -> l <> nil
one_cover_ex : forall (A : Type) (l : list (btree A)), l <> nil -> exists t : btree A, cover l t
build_same_weight_tree : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t1 t2 : btree A), build l t1 -> build l t2 -> weight_tree f t1 = weight_tree f t2
build_cover : forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), build l t -> cover l t
app_removelast_last : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (d : A), l <> nil -> l = removelast l ++ last l d :: nil
build_ind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop, (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> P l2 t -> P l1 t) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), build l b -> P l b
build_sind : forall P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp, (forall t : btree A, P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> P l2 t -> P l1 t) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), build l b -> P l b
height_pred_not_nil2 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> l <> nil
height_pred_not_nil1 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> ln <> nil
map_eq_nil : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), map f l = nil -> l = nil
prod2list : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> nat
not_null_cons : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (b : list bool) (l : list (A * list bool)), b <> nil -> not_null l -> not_null ((a, b) :: l)
permutation_nil_inv : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), permutation l nil -> l = nil
find_min_correct : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A), match find_min f l with | Some (a, b) => (In b l /\ a = f b) /\ (forall c : A, In c l -> f b <= f c) | None => l = nil end
removelast_app : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), l' <> nil -> removelast (l ++ l') = l ++ removelast l'
cover_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), {cover l t} + {~ cover l t}
Inductive ulist (A : Type) : list A -> Prop := ulist_nil : ulist nil | ulist_cons : forall (a : A) (l : list A), ~ In a l -> ulist l -> ulist (a :: l) Arguments ulist [A]%type_scope _%list_scope Arguments ulist_nil _%type_scope Arguments ulist_cons _%type_scope _ _%list_scope
all_cover_aux : forall A : Type, list (btree A) -> nat -> list (btree A)
exist_first_max : forall l : list nat, l <> nil -> exists (a : nat) (l1 l2 : list nat), l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l1 -> n1 < a) /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l2 -> n1 <= a)
build_permutation : forall (l1 l2 : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), build l1 t -> permutation l1 l2 -> build l2 t
weight_tree_list : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> list (btree A) -> nat
app_eq_nil : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), l ++ l' = nil -> l = nil /\ l' = nil
height_pred_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
height_pred_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : nat -> list nat -> list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall (n : nat) (t : btree A), P n (n :: nil) (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (n : nat) (ln1 ln2 : list nat) (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), height_pred (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> P (S n) ln1 l1 t1 -> height_pred (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P (S n) ln2 l2 t2 -> P n (ln1 ++ ln2) (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (n : nat) (l : list nat) (l0 : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), height_pred n l l0 b -> P n l l0 b
build_step : forall (t : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), one_step f l1 l2 -> build l2 t -> build l1 t
first_n : forall A : Type, list A -> nat -> list A
skip_n : forall A : Type, list A -> nat -> list A
cover_inv_leaf : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l (leaf a) -> l = leaf a :: nil
cover_all_cover_aux : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list (btree A)) (t : btree A), n = length l -> cover l t -> In t (all_cover_aux A l n)
height_pred_larger_strict : forall (A : Type) (n n1 : nat) (ln : list nat) (t : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), height_pred n ln l t -> In n1 ln -> n < n1 \/ ln = n :: nil /\ l = t :: nil
ordered_cover_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> Prop), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
ordered_cover_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list (btree A) -> btree A -> SProp), (forall t : btree A, list (btree A) -> P (t :: nil) t) -> (forall (t1 t2 : btree A) (l1 l2 : list (btree A)), list (btree A) -> ordered_cover l1 t1 -> P l1 t1 -> ordered_cover l2 t2 -> P l2 t2 -> P (l1 ++ l2) (node t1 t2)) -> forall (l : list (btree A)) (b : btree A), ordered_cover l b -> P l b
permutation_one_inv : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), permutation (a :: nil) l -> l = a :: nil
list_length_induction : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Type), (forall l1 : list A, (forall l2 : list A, length l2 < length l1 -> P l2) -> P l1) -> forall l : list A, P l
list_length_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), (forall l1 : list A, (forall l2 : list A, length l2 < length l1 -> P l2) -> P l1) -> forall l : list A, P l
cover_inv_app_aux : forall (A : Type) (t t1 t2 : btree A) (l : list (btree A)), cover l t -> t = node t1 t2 -> l = node t1 t2 :: nil \/ (exists l1 l2 : list (btree A), (cover l1 t1 /\ cover l2 t2) /\ permutation l (l1 ++ l2))
ulist_dec : forall A : Type, (forall a b : A, {a = b} + {a <> b}) -> forall l : list A, {ulist l} + {~ ulist l}

```  
intros l H.
destruct l.
- intro contra. contradiction.
- exists b. apply build_one.
```

original: intros l H. destruct l. - intro contra. contradiction. - exists b. apply build_one.
